text: Ivashov () is a Russian masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Ivashova. It may refer to: * Leonid Ivashov (born 1943), Russian military and public official. * Vladimir Ivashov (1939—1995), Russian Soviet actor. * Valentina Ivashova (1915–1991), Soviet film actress. == See also == * Asteroid 12978 Ivashov, named after Vladimir Ivashov Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Ivashov
